Name: La Aventura De Axel
About the game: The adventure of Axel, is an adventure in which you have to find the way to pass different labyrinths and puzzles to be able to rescue your sister. Dive into a world full of magic and fantasy where Axel, a teenager who for different circumstances loses his sister and decides to go to rescue her before something worse can happen, so she has just entered an old mine to undertake a mysterious adventure. You can play with the mouse or the arrow keys to move the character. You can 'enter key' with the different characters of the actions. For any doubt: Facebook: La Aventura De Axel
